issue.title: [Rust] [Integration Testing] Enable passing tests and update spec doc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8883](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8883). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some of the integration test failures can be avoided by disabling unsupported tests, like large lists and nested types

comments.body:
